detail:
The Timeless Treasure
Engage yourself with an ageless asset and it will become your jewel; your timeless treasure that can be passed on from generation to generation.
The palladian-inspired architectural style intertwines harmoniously with modern contemporary artistic touches, resulting in a sight that simply shines through time. Enjoy a perfect setting of the contemporary, sophisticated, yet classic living environment.
Bask in the ambiance of luxurious comfort at one of Bangkok’s rarest locations, Sukhumvit 39, renowned for its upscale neighborhood and comforts, is also home to the center of business as well as a refined, desirable lifestyle, the diplomat 39 truly stands as a timeless asset.
The Diplomat 39 features 31-stories of luxurious living space. Each room is meticulously planned to ensure a spacious living area. Redefine richness and style through timeless living.

description:
The Clover Thonglor Sukhumvit 55 is a condo for sale in Bangkok that was developed by Living Land Capital and completed in 2010.
This Bangkok condo for sale in Thong Lo comprises 5 buildings each one having 9 floors.
In total, there are 590 apartments in The Clover Thong Lo.
Harmony Living In Thong Lo
Located in Sukhumvit soi 55, only 15 minutes from BTS Thong Lo, the location offers residents superior commuting convenience for both leisure and business.
Surrounded by the vibrant neighborhood of Little Tokyo, and a stone’s throw from Thong Lo, the development covers an array of amenities ranging from hospitals, International schools, supermarkets, and a variety of cafes and restaurants.
Landscaped especially for residents who wish to escape the buzz and bustle of city life, the development has put careful consideration into the selection of trees, plants, and other green elements featured in the development. The highlight of the pristine landscape is the common courtyard at the center of the development.
